q: Aaron Rodgers : "That's true." David Letterman : "So you were running a club, some guys older than you, some guys, certainly more experience." Aaron Rodgers : I think leading by example was the most important lesson I learned. It's hard to be able to have the words to relate to a guy like that, who's been through prison, who's been in the workforce, been in the military. ( audience laughs) David Letterman :( Laughs) "I don't know why this is funny."( Audience laughs) Aaron Rodgers :( Laughs) "I'll stop right there.

: With the Blazers in front by seven after LaMarcus Aldridge 's basket with 1:46 remaining, they failed to score on three straight possessions. The Heat converted seven points over that duration to draw even. . Carl Galeana, who runs dealerships in suburban Detroit, Florida and South Carolina, said he is impressed with the turnaround that Sergio Marchionne engineered. "I think this guy is a visionary," he said. He talks about what he needs to do and he goes out and gets it done. Of the 16 new or revamped models, five were rebuilt from the ground up in under two years, far faster than the normal three or four years. They include the 300 big sedan, the Jeep Grand

was clued in, and despite the absence of any link between Saddam Hussein and the terrorist attacks. The book retraces familiar ground-the U.S. intelligence estimates in 2002 that Saddam Hussein had chemical and biological weapons-with Donald Rumsfeld arguing that recent history is abundant with examples of flawed intelligence that have affected key national security decisions and contingency planning. This, of course, was the mother of all intelligence failures, but Donald Rumsfeld attempts to shift the argument to higher ground, saying illegal weapons "should have been only one of the many reasons" for invading

Ad Feedback Indiana Rep. Mike Pence announced Thursday he won't seek the Republican nomination for president in 2012, but hinted a possible run for governor. In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana, he said in a letter being sent to supporters. "We will not seek the Republican nomination for president in 2012." The Indianapolis Star reported Mike Pence said he would make a decision "later this

during a statewide bus tour last fall. "He's been very helpful. He's been supportive not only to me, but to the rest of the freshman congressional delegation," Bucshon said. A person like him, with a wealth of experience, is always important to have backing you up when you're just getting started. Bucshon wouldn't speculate about Mike Pence 's future, but said, "No matter what he decides to do, I'll be supportive." Other Republicans seemed more sure of Mike Pence 's plans

spark for Detroit after a slow start, winning his first game since joining the Pistons, 100-92 over the Sacramento Martin Luther King on Tuesday night. "It was a huge lift off of me," Allen Iverson said. I knew it would happen. You think every game you go out and play it's going to happen. It feels good. I wanted to get the monkey off my back. I'm just excited that I got my first win and I can now try to get a lot more. Tayshaun Prince added 26 points and 11 rebounds for the Pistons, who had lost their first two games since acquiring Allen Iverson from Denver last week for All-Star point guard Chauncey Billups , key reserve Antonio McDyess and Cheikh Samb . and Washington counties because of snow and ice damage. Disaster relief from the U.S. Department of Agriculture could help farmers recover from property damage and livestock losses due to weeks of snow and ice buildup. The amount of heavy snow we've received this winter is unprecedented, Kirsten Gillibrand said. "Federal assistance is absolutely critical to helping these hardworking farm families recover." " he grins. The passion is not expected to immediately translate into sales, however. During the first year, Mr Galeana expects to sell no more than 250-300 cars, which he acknowledges is not a great amount of vehicles . But it is a start- and one that the company will build on.
